attributes.action: Provide webcams with sound in all school areas for parent use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please describe which part is difficult to understand.

Webcams with sound should be introduced into all schools (restricted to parent use). This would allow parents to observe how their children are being taught. The government statement about the teaching of R.E to educate about religion does not fit with the "collective worship" that is part of the primary school doctrine. Collective worship should be an opt-in option in schools, not an opt-out. This would leave a child feeling excluded.
